2025-03-25 22:58:29.384 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."Id", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC

ORDER BY "m"."Sira", "m"."MenuID", "m0"."MenuId"

SELECT "m"."MenuID", "m"."Action", "m"."Ad", "m"."AktifMi", "m"."Controller", "m"."GuncellemeTarihi", "m"."Icon", "m"."OlusturanKullaniciID", "m"."OlusturmaTarihi", "m"."Silindi", "m"."Sira", "m"."SoftDelete", "m"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID", "m"."Url", "m"."UstMenuID", "m0"."MenuId", "m0"."RolId", "m0"."MenuRolID", "m0"."OlusturmaTarihi"
FROM "Menuler" AS "m"
LEFT JOIN "MenuRoller" AS "m0" ON "m"."MenuID" = "m0"."MenuId"
WHERE "m"."AktifMi" AND NOT ("m"."Silindi")
ORDER BY "m"."Sira", "m"."MenuID", "m0"."MenuId"

SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."Id", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC

SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."Id", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC

SELECT "m"."MenuID", "m"."Action", "m"."Ad", "m"."AktifMi", "m"."Controller", "m"."GuncellemeTarihi", "m"."Icon", "m"."OlusturanKullaniciID", "m"."OlusturmaTarihi", "m"."Silindi", "m"."Sira", "m"."SoftDelete", "m"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID", "m"."Url", "m"."UstMenuID", "m0"."MenuId", "m0"."RolId", "m0"."MenuRolID", "m0"."OlusturmaTarihi"
FROM "Menuler" AS "m"
LEFT JOIN "MenuRoller" AS "m0" ON "m"."MenuID" = "m0"."MenuId"
WHERE "m"."AktifMi" AND NOT ("m"."Silindi")
ORDER BY "m"."Sira", "m"."MenuID", "m0"."MenuId"

SELECT "m"."MenuID", "m"."Action", "m"."Ad", "m"."AktifMi", "m"."Controller", "m"."GuncellemeTarihi", "m"."Icon", "m"."OlusturanKullaniciID", "m"."OlusturmaTarihi", "m"."Silindi", "m"."Sira", "m"."SoftDelete", "m"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID", "m"."Url", "m"."UstMenuID", "m0"."MenuId", "m0"."RolId", "m0"."MenuRolID", "m0"."OlusturmaTarihi"
FROM "Menuler" AS "m"
LEFT JOIN "MenuRoller" AS "m0" ON "m"."MenuID" = "m0"."MenuId"
WHERE "m"."AktifMi" AND NOT ("m"."Silindi")
ORDER BY "m"."Sira", "m"."MenuID", "m0"."MenuId"

FROM "Menuler" AS "m"
LEFT JOIN "MenuRoller" AS "m0" ON "m"."MenuID" = "m0"."MenuId"
WHERE "m"."AktifMi" AND NOT ("m"."Silindi")
ORDER BY "m"."Sira", "m"."MenuID", "m0"."MenuId"

FROM "Menuler" AS "m"
LEFT JOIN "MenuRoller" AS "m0" ON "m"."MenuID" = "m0"."MenuId"
WHERE "m"."AktifMi" AND NOT ("m"."Silindi")
ORDER BY "m"."Sira", "m"."MenuID", "m0"."MenuId"

FROM "Faturalar" AS "f"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."Id", "c"."Aciklama", "c"."Ad", "c"."Adres", "c"."AktifMi", "c"."BaslangicBakiye", "c"."CariKodu", "c"."CariTipi", "c"."Email", "c"."GuncellemeTarihi", "c"."Il", "c"."Ilce", "c"."Notlar", "c"."OlusturanKullaniciId", "c"."OlusturmaTarihi", "c"."PostaKodu", "c"."SoftDelete", "c"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId", "c"."Telefon", "c"."Ulke", "c"."VergiDairesi", "c"."VergiNo", "c"."WebSitesi", "c"."Yetkili"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "f"."CariID" = "c0"."Id"
LEFT JOIN "FaturaTurleri" AS "f0" ON "f"."FaturaTuruID" = "f0"."FaturaTuruID"
WHERE NOT ("f"."SoftDelete")
ORDER BY "f"."FaturaTarihi" DESC

2025-03-25 23:04:43.701 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."Id", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC

FROM "Faturalar" AS "f"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."Id", "c"."Aciklama", "c"."Ad", "c"."Adres", "c"."AktifMi", "c"."BaslangicBakiye", "c"."CariKodu", "c"."CariTipi", "c"."Email", "c"."GuncellemeTarihi", "c"."Il", "c"."Ilce", "c"."Notlar", "c"."OlusturanKullaniciId", "c"."OlusturmaTarihi", "c"."PostaKodu", "c"."SoftDelete", "c"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId", "c"."Telefon", "c"."Ulke", "c"."VergiDairesi", "c"."VergiNo", "c"."WebSitesi", "c"."Yetkili"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "f"."CariID" = "c0"."Id"
LEFT JOIN "FaturaTurleri" AS "f0" ON "f"."FaturaTuruID" = "f0"."FaturaTuruID"
WHERE NOT ("f"."SoftDelete")
ORDER BY "f"."FaturaTarihi" DESC

SELECT "f"."FaturaID", "f"."Aktif", "f"."AraToplam", "f"."CariID", "f"."DovizKuru", "f"."DovizTuru", "f"."FaturaNotu", "f"."FaturaNumarasi", "f"."FaturaTarihi", "f"."FaturaTuruID", "f"."GenelToplam", "f"."GuncellemeTarihi", "f"."KDVToplam", "f"."OdemeDurumu", "f"."OdemeTuruID", "f"."OlusturanKullaniciID", "f"."OlusturmaTarihi", "f"."Resmi", "f"."SiparisNumarasi", "f"."SoftDelete", "f"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID", "f"."VadeTarihi", "c0"."Id", "c0"."Aciklama", "c0"."Ad", "c0"."Adres", "c0"."AktifMi", "c0"."BaslangicBakiye", "c0"."CariKodu", "c0"."CariTipi", "c0"."Email", "c0"."GuncellemeTarihi", "c0"."Il", "c0"."Ilce", "c0"."Notlar", "c0"."OlusturanKullaniciId", "c0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "c0"."PostaKodu", "c0"."SoftDelete", "c0"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId", "c0"."Telefon", "c0"."Ulke", "c0"."VergiDairesi", "c0"."VergiNo", "c0"."WebSitesi", "c0"."Yetkili", "f0"."FaturaTuruID", "f0"."FaturaTuruAdi", "f0"."HareketTuru"
FROM "Faturalar" AS "f"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."Id", "c"."Aciklama", "c"."Ad", "c"."Adres", "c"."AktifMi", "c"."BaslangicBakiye", "c"."CariKodu", "c"."CariTipi", "c"."Email", "c"."GuncellemeTarihi", "c"."Il", "c"."Ilce", "c"."Notlar", "c"."OlusturanKullaniciId", "c"."OlusturmaTarihi", "c"."PostaKodu", "c"."SoftDelete", "c"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId", "c"."Telefon", "c"."Ulke", "c"."VergiDairesi", "c"."VergiNo", "c"."WebSitesi", "c"."Yetkili"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "f"."CariID" = "c0"."Id"
LEFT JOIN "FaturaTurleri" AS "f0" ON "f"."FaturaTuruID" = "f0"."FaturaTuruID"
WHERE NOT ("f"."SoftDelete")
ORDER BY "f"."FaturaTarihi" DESC

2025-03-25 23:14:27.052 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."Id", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC

2025-03-25 23:14:43.944 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."Id", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC

2025-03-25 23:27:13.174 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."CariID", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."CariID"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC

2025-03-25 23:37:34.438 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."CariID", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."CariID"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"

2025-03-25 23:39:25.732 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."CariID", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."CariID"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC

SELECT "f"."FaturaID", "f"."Aktif", "f"."AraToplam", "f"."CariID", "f"."DovizKuru", "f"."DovizTuru", "f"."FaturaNotu", "f"."FaturaNumarasi", "f"."FaturaTarihi", "f"."FaturaTuruID", "f"."GenelToplam", "f"."GuncellemeTarihi", "f"."KDVToplam", "f"."OdemeDurumu", "f"."OdemeTuruID", "f"."OlusturanKullaniciID", "f"."OlusturmaTarihi", "f"."Resmi", "f"."SiparisNumarasi", "f"."SoftDelete", "f"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciID", "f"."VadeTarihi", "c0"."CariID", "c0"."Aciklama", "c0"."Ad", "c0"."Adres", "c0"."AktifMi", "c0"."BaslangicBakiye", "c0"."CariKodu", "c0"."CariTipi", "c0"."Email", "c0"."GuncellemeTarihi", "c0"."Il", "c0"."Ilce", "c0"."Notlar", "c0"."OlusturanKullaniciId", "c0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "c0"."PostaKodu", "c0"."SoftDelete", "c0"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId", "c0"."Telefon", "c0"."Ulke", "c0"."VergiDairesi", "c0"."VergiNo", "c0"."WebSitesi", "c0"."Yetkili", "f0"."FaturaTuruID", "f0"."FaturaTuruAdi", "f0"."HareketTuru"
FROM "Faturalar" AS "f"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."CariID", "c"."Aciklama", "c"."Ad", "c"."Adres", "c"."AktifMi", "c"."BaslangicBakiye", "c"."CariKodu", "c"."CariTipi", "c"."Email", "c"."GuncellemeTarihi", "c"."Il", "c"."Ilce", "c"."Notlar", "c"."OlusturanKullaniciId", "c"."OlusturmaTarihi", "c"."PostaKodu", "c"."SoftDelete", "c"."SonGuncelleyenKullaniciId", "c"."Telefon", "c"."Ulke", "c"."VergiDairesi", "c"."VergiNo", "c"."WebSitesi", "c"."Yetkili"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "f"."CariID" = "c0"."CariID"
LEFT JOIN "FaturaTurleri" AS "f0" ON "f"."FaturaTuruID" = "f0"."FaturaTuruID"
WHERE NOT ("f"."SoftDelete")
ORDER BY "f"."FaturaTarihi" DESC

SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."CariID", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."CariID"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC

2025-03-25 23:53:13.512 +03:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (0ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT "i0"."IrsaliyeID", "i0"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i0"."CariID", "c0"."Ad" AS "CariAdi", "i0"."FaturaID", CASE
    WHEN "f"."FaturaID" IS NOT NULL THEN "f"."FaturaNumarasi"
    ELSE ''
END AS "FaturaNumarasi", "i0"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i0"."Aciklama", (
    SELECT COALESCE(ef_sum(ef_multiply("i1"."BirimFiyat", "i1"."Miktar")), '0.0')
    FROM "IrsaliyeDetaylari" AS "i1"
    WHERE "i0"."IrsaliyeID" = "i1"."IrsaliyeID") AS "ToplamTutar", "i0"."Aktif", "i0"."OlusturmaTarihi", "i0"."GuncellemeTarihi"
FROM (
    SELECT "i"."IrsaliyeID", "i"."Aciklama", "i"."Aktif", "i"."CariID", "i"."FaturaID", "i"."GuncellemeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeNumarasi", "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi", "i"."IrsaliyeTuru", "i"."OlusturmaTarihi"
    FROM "Irsaliyeler" AS "i"
    WHERE "i"."Aktif"
    ORDER BY "i"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS "i0"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT "c"."CariID", "c"."Ad"
    FROM "Cariler" AS "c"
    WHERE NOT ("c"."SoftDelete") AND "c"."AktifMi"
) AS "c0" ON "i0"."CariID" = "c0"."CariID"
LEFT JOIN "Faturalar" AS "f" ON "i0"."FaturaID" = "f"."FaturaID"
ORDER BY "i0"."IrsaliyeTarihi" DESC
